about_the_game:
This easy-to-master motocross racing game is fun for everyone! Play with up to four players!

Try out each bike's special abilities and take your favorite to the courses!

Fulfill your need for speed on traditional tracks or tackle rugged courses brimming with nature! You can even create custom courses to make the races your own!

Drift to take curves and turns like a pro! Nail jumps and mid-air tricks to show everyone what you've got! There's nothing like using your skills to beat your rivals with style.

[Free Race]
Set and keep trying to beat your record times on your favorite track!

[Grand Prix]
Select four tracks to create the ultimate course to battle on for the champion title!

[Course Creator]
Design your very own unique racetracks!

Up to four players can join in the high-speed fun! Duke it out with friends and family and try to seize first place with flair!

name: EXTREME BIKE X

subs.option_text: エクストリームバイクX - $9.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended

short_description: Amaze everyone with your speed and tricks! This motocross racing game is impossible to put down! Add to the fun by making your very own racetracks!
